362 /**
363  * create a bookmark to a page in the geocaching.com name space
364  * @param {String} title
365  * @param {String} href
366  * @returns {Object} bookmark
367  */
368 function bookmark(title, href) {
369   var bm = new Object();
370   bookmarks[bookmarks.length] = bm;
371   bm['href'] = href;
372   bm['title'] = title;
373   return bm;
374 }
375 
376 /**
377  * create a bookmark to an external site
378  * @param {String} title
379  * @param {String} href
380  */
381 function externalBookmark(title, href) {
382   var bm = bookmark(title, href);
383   bm['rel'] = "external";
384   bm['target'] = "_blank";
385 }
386 
387 /**
388  * create a bookmark to a profile sub site
389  * @param {String} title
390  * @param {String} id
391  */
392 function profileBookmark(title, id) {
393   var bm = bookmark(title, "#");
394   bm['id'] = id;
395   bm['name'] = id;
396 }
397 
398 /**
399  * check if the current document location matches the the given path
400  * @param {String} path partial or full path to a geocaching.com web page
401  * @returns {Boolean} true if the current page matches the path
402  */
403 function isLocation(path) {
404   path = path.toLowerCase();
405   if (path.indexOf("http") != 0) {
406     if (path.charAt(0) != '/') {
407       path = "/" + path;
408     }
409     path = "http://www.geocaching.com" + path;
410   }
411   return document.location.href.toLowerCase().indexOf(path) == 0;
412 }
413 
414 // define bookmarks
415 var bookmarks = new Array();
416 
417 bookmark("Watchlist", "/my/watchlist.aspx");
418 bookmark("Geocaches", "/my/geocaches.aspx");
419 bookmark("My Geocaches", "/my/owned.aspx");

470 if (!this.GM_getValue || (this.GM_getValue.toString && this.GM_getValue.toString().indexOf("not supported")>-1)) {
471   this.GM_getValue=function (key,def) {
472     return localStorage[key] || def;
473   };
474   this.GM_setValue=function (key,value) {
475     return localStorage[key]=value;
476   };
477 }
478 if(!this.uneval){
479   this.uneval = function (value) {  };
480   browser = "chrome";
481 }
482 if(!this.eval){
483   this.eval = function (value) { return JSON.parse(value); };
484   this.uneval = function (value) { return JSON.stringify(value); };
485   browser = "opera";
486 }

508   if(typeof(GM_log) != "undefined"){
509     GM_log(txt);
510   }

600 // Settings: Custom Bookmarks
601 var num = bookmarks.length;
602 for(var i=0; i<anzCustom; i++){
603   bookmarks[num] = Object();
604   
605   if(typeof(GM_getValue("settings_custom_bookmark["+i+"]")) != "undefined" && GM_getValue("settings_custom_bookmark["+i+"]") != ""){
606     bookmarks[num]['href'] = GM_getValue("settings_custom_bookmark["+i+"]");
607   }else{
608     bookmarks[num]['href'] = "#";
609   }
610   
611   if(typeof(GM_getValue("settings_bookmarks_title["+num+"]")) != "undefined" && GM_getValue("settings_bookmarks_title["+num+"]") != ""){
612     bookmarks[num]['title'] = GM_getValue("settings_bookmarks_title["+num+"]");
613   }else{
614     bookmarks[num]['title'] = "Custom"+i;
615     GM_setValue("settings_bookmarks_title["+num+"]",bookmarks[num]['title']);
616   }
617   
618   if(typeof(GM_getValue("settings_custom_bookmark_target["+i+"]")) != "undefined" && GM_getValue("settings_custom_bookmark_target["+i+"]") != ""){
619     bookmarks[num]['target'] = GM_getValue("settings_custom_bookmark_target["+i+"]");
620     bookmarks[num]['rel'] = "external";
621   }else{
622     bookmarks[num]['target'] = "";
623   }
624   
625   bookmarks[num]['custom'] = true;
626   num++;
627 }

655 function main(){
656 // Link on Google Maps
657 if(document.location.href.match(/^(http|https):\/\/maps\.google\.(de|com)/) || document.location.href.match(/^(http|https):\/\/www\.google\.(de|com)\/maps/)){
658   if(settings_show_google_maps){
659     var ref_link = document.getElementById("link");
660     if(ref_link){
661       function open_gc(){
662         var matches = ref_link.href.match(/&ll=([-0-9]*\.[0-9]*),([-0-9]*\.[0-9]*)/);
663         var zoom = ref_link.href.match(/z=([0-9]*)/);
664         if (matches != null && zoom != null) {
665           var gc_map_url = map_url + "?lat=" + matches[1] + "&lng=" + matches[2] + "&zm=" + zoom[1];
666           window.open(gc_map_url);
667         }
668         else {
669           alert("This map has no geographical coordinates in its link. Just zoom or drag the map, afterwards this will work fine.");
670         }
671       }
672     
673       var box = ref_link.parentNode;
674       
675       var gcImage = document.createElement("img");
676       gcImage.setAttribute("src","http://www.geocaching.com/images/about/logos/geocaching/Logo_Geocaching_color_notext_32.png");
677       gcImage.setAttribute("title", "Show area at geocaching.com");
678       gcImage.setAttribute("alt", "Show area at geocaching.com");
679 
680       var link = document.createElement("a");
681       link.setAttribute("title","Show area at geocaching.com");
682       link.setAttribute("href","#");
683       link.setAttribute("id","gc_com_lnk");
684 
685       link.appendChild(gcImage);
686       box.appendChild(link);
687       
688       document.getElementById('gc_com_lnk').addEventListener("click", open_gc, false);
689     }
690   }
691 }else{
692   
693 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
694 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
695 // Helper
696 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
697 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
698 // Run after Redirect
699 if(GM_getValue("run_after_redirect") != ""){
700   try{
701     eval("unsafeWindow."+GM_getValue("run_after_redirect"));
702   }catch(e){ gclh_error("Run after Redirect",e); }
703   GM_setValue("run_after_redirect","");
704 }

706 function getElementsByClass(classname){
707   var result = new Array();
708   var all_elements = document.getElementsByTagName("*");
709 
710   for(var i=0; i<all_elements.length;i++){
711     if(all_elements[i].className == classname){
712       result.push(all_elements[i]);
713     }
714   }
715 
716   return result;
717 }
718 
719 function in_array(search,arr){
720   for(var i=0; i<arr.length;i++) if(arr[i] == search) return true;
721   return false;
722 }

724 function caseInsensitiveSort(a, b){  // http://www.codingforums.com/showthread.php?t=10477
725   var ret = 0;
726   a = a.toLowerCase();b = b.toLowerCase();
727   if(a > b) 
728     ret = 1;
729   if(a < b) 
730     ret = -1; 
731   return ret;
732 }

734 function urlencode(s) {
735   s = s.replace(/&/g,"&");
736   s = encodeURIComponent(s);  //Kodiert alle auÃŸer den folgenden Zeichen: A bis Z und a bis z und - _ . ! ~ * ' ( )
737   s = s.replace(/~/g,"%7e");
738   s = s.replace(/'/g,"%27");
739   s = s.replace(/%26amp%3b/g,"%26");
740   s = s.replace(/ /g,"+");
741   //GC.com codiert - _ . ! * ( ) selbst nicht, daher wird dies hier auch nicht extra behandel
742   return s;
743 }
744 
745 function urldecode(s) {
746   s = s.replace(/\+/g," ");
747   s = s.replace(/%7e/g,"~");
748   s = s.replace(/%27/g,"'");
749   s = decodeURIComponent(s);
750   return s;
751 }
752 
753 function html_to_str(s) {
754   s = s.replace(/\&/g,"&");
755   s = s.replace(/\ /g," ");
756   return s;
757 }
758 
759 function trim(s) {
760   var whitespace = ' \n ';
761   for (var i = 0; i < whitespace.length; i++) {
762     while (s.substring(0, 1) == whitespace.charAt(i)) {
763       s = s.substring(1, s.length);
764     }
765     while (s.substring(s.length - 1, s.length) == whitespace.charAt(i)) {
766       s = s.substring(0, s.length - 1);
767     }
768   }
769 
770   if(s.substring(s.length-6,s.length) == " ") s = s.substring(0,s.length-6);
771 
772   return s;
773 }

782 // Helper: from N/S/E/W Deg Min.Sec to Dec
783 function toDec(coords){
784   var match = coords.match(/^(N|S) ([0-9][0-9]). ([0-9][0-9])\.([0-9][0-9][0-9]) (E|W) ([0-9][0-9][0-9]). ([0-9][0-9])\.([0-9][0-9][0-9])$/);
785 
786   if(match){
787     var dec1 = parseInt(match[2],10) + (parseFloat(match[3]+"."+match[4])/60);
788     if(match[1] == "S") dec1 = dec1 * -1;
789     dec1 = Math.round(dec1*10000000)/10000000;
790 
791     var dec2 = parseInt(match[6],10) + (parseFloat(match[7]+"."+match[8])/60);
792     if(match[5] == "W") dec2 = dec2 * -1;
793     dec2 = Math.round(dec2*10000000)/10000000;
794 
795     return new Array(dec1,dec2);
796   }else return false;
797 }
798 
799 // Helper: from Deg to DMS
800 function DegtoDMS(coords){
801   var match = coords.match(/^(N|S) ([0-9][0-9]). ([0-9][0-9])\.([0-9][0-9][0-9]) (E|W) ([0-9][0-9][0-9]). ([0-9][0-9])\.([0-9][0-9][0-9])$/);
802   if(!match) return "";
803 
804   var lat1 = parseInt(match[2],10);
805   var lat2 = parseInt(match[3],10);
806   var lat3 = parseFloat("0."+match[4])*60;
807   lat3 = Math.round(lat3*10000)/10000;
808 
809   var lng1 = parseInt(match[6],10); 
810   var lng2 = parseInt(match[7],10);
811   var lng3 = parseFloat("0."+match[8])*60;
812   lng3 = Math.round(lng3*10000)/10000;
813 
814   return match[1]+" "+lat1+"Â° "+lat2+"' "+lat3+"\" "+match[5]+" "+lng1+"Â° "+lng2+"' "+lng3+"\"";
815 }
816 
817 // Helper: from Dec to Deg
818 function DectoDeg(lat,lng){
819   lat = lat/10000000;
820   var pre = "";
821   if(lat > 0) pre = "N";
822   else{ pre = "S"; lat = lat * -1; }
823   var tmp1 = parseInt(lat);
824   var tmp2 = (lat-tmp1)*60;
825   tmp1 = String(tmp1);
826   if(tmp1.length == 1) tmp1 = "0"+tmp1;
827   tmp2 = Math.round(tmp2*10000)/10000;
828   tmp2 = String(tmp2);
829   if(tmp2.length == 3) tmp2 = tmp2+"000";
830   else if(tmp2.length == 4) tmp2 = tmp2+"00";
831   else if(tmp2.length == 5) tmp2 = tmp2+"0";
832   var new_lat = pre+" "+tmp1+"Â° "+tmp2;
833 
834   lng = lng/10000000;
835   var pre = "";
836   if(lng > 0) pre = "E";
837   else{ pre = "W"; lng = lng * -1; }
838   var tmp1 = parseInt(lng);
839   var tmp2 = (lng-tmp1)*60;
840   tmp1 = String(tmp1);
841   if(tmp1.length == 2) tmp1 = "0"+tmp1;
842   else if(tmp1.length == 1) tmp1 = "00"+tmp1;
843   tmp2 = Math.round(tmp2*10000)/10000;
844   tmp2 = String(tmp2);
845   if(tmp2.length == 3) tmp2 = tmp2+"000";
846   else if(tmp2.length == 4) tmp2 = tmp2+"00";
847   else if(tmp2.length == 5) tmp2 = tmp2+"0";
848   var new_lng = pre+" "+tmp1+"Â° "+tmp2;
849 
850   return new_lat+" "+new_lng;
851 }

853 /**
854  * check whether the user has set his home coordinates
855  * @returns {Boolean}
856  */
857 function homeCoordinatesSet() {
858   if(typeof(GM_getValue("home_lat")) == "undefined" || typeof(GM_getValue("home_lng")) == "undefined"){
859     if (window.confirm("To use this link, you have to set your home coordinates.")) {
860       document.location.href = "http://www.geocaching.com/account/ManageLocations.aspx";
861     }
862     return false;
863   }
864   return true;
865 }

867 // Helper
868 function addLinkEvent(name,fkt){
869   if(document.getElementsByName(name).length > 0){
870     var links = document.getElementsByName(name);
871     for(var i = 0; i < links.length; i++){
872       links[i].addEventListener("click", fkt, false);
873     }
874   }else if(document.getElementById(name)){
875     document.getElementById(name).addEventListener("click", fkt, false);
876   }
877 }

1250         if (decryptKey) {
1251           decryptKey.parentNode.removeChild(decryptKey);
1252         }      
1253       }
1254     }
1255   }
1256 }catch(e){ gclh_error("Hide Hint",e); }

1258 //show disabled/archived caches with strikeout in title
1259 try{
1260   if(settings_strike_archived && document.location.href.match(/^http:\/\/www\.geocaching\.com\/seek\/cache_details\.aspx(\?|\?pf\=\&)(guid|wp)\=[a-zA-Z0-9-]*/)){
1261     var warnings = getElementsByClass('OldWarning');
1262     if (warnings[0]) {
1263       var cacheTitle = document.getElementById('ctl00_ContentBody_CacheName');
1264       if (cacheTitle) {
1265         var parent = cacheTitle.parentNode;
1266         if (parent) {
1267           parent.removeChild(cacheTitle);
1268           var strike = document.createElement('strike');
1269           parent.appendChild(strike);
1270           strike.appendChild(cacheTitle);
1271         }
1272       }
1273     }
1274   }
1275 }catch(e){ gclh_error("Strike Archived",e); }

1347 // BBCode helper function
1348 function gclh_add_insert_fkt(id){
1349   var code = "function gclh_insert(aTag,eTag){"; // http://aktuell.de.selfhtml.org/artikel/javascript/bbcode/
1350   code += "  var input = document.getElementById('"+id+"');";
1351   code += "  if(typeof input.selectionStart != 'undefined'){";
1352   code += "    var start = input.selectionStart;";
1353   code += "    var end = input.selectionEnd;";
1354   code += "    var insText = input.value.substring(start, end);";
1355   code += "    input.value = input.value.substr(0, start) + aTag + insText + eTag + input.value.substr(end);";
1356   code += "    /* Anpassen der Cursorposition */";
1357   code += "    var pos;";
1358   code += "    if (insText.length == 0) {";
1359   code += "      pos = start + aTag.length;";
1360   code += "    } else {";
1361   code += "      pos = start + aTag.length + insText.length + eTag.length;";
1362   code += "    }";
1363   code += "    input.selectionStart = pos;";
1364   code += "    input.selectionEnd = pos;";
1365   code += "  }";
1366   code += "  input.focus();";
1367   code += "}";
1368 
1369   var script = document.createElement("script");
1370   script.innerHTML = code;
1371   document.getElementsByTagName("body")[0].appendChild(script);
1372 }

1495     function limitLogText(limitField) {

1497       var editor = $('#ctl00_ContentBody_LogBookPanel1_uxLogInfo');
1498       var limitNum = parseInt($('#ctl00_ContentBody_LogBookPanel1_uxLogInfo').attr("CKEMaxLength"));

1503         counterelement.innerHTML = '<font color="red">' + length + '/' + limitNum  + '</font>';
1504         limitField.scrollTop = limitField.scrollHeight;
1505         limitField.selectionStart = 4000;
1506         limitField.selectionEnd = 4000;
1507       }else{
1508         counterelement.innerHTML = length + '/' + limitNum;
1509       }
1510     }

1513     logfield.addEventListener("keyup", function(){ limitLogText(logfield); }, false);
1514     logfield.addEventListener("change", function(){ limitLogText(logfield); }, false);

1527 // Show Eventday beside Date
1528 try{
1529   if(settings_show_eventday && document.location.href.match(/^http:\/\/www\.geocaching\.com\/(seek\/cache_details)\.aspx.*/) && document.getElementById('cacheDetails').getElementsByTagName("img")[0].src.match(/.*\/images\/WptTypes\/(6|453|13).gif/)){ //Event, MegaEvent, Cito
1530     if(document.getElementById('cacheDetails').getElementsByTagName("span")){
1531       var cont = document.getElementById('cacheDetails').getElementsByTagName("span");
1532       var counter = 0;
1533       var spanelem = null;
1534       var elem;
1535       for (var elemName in cont){
1536         elem=cont[elemName];
1537         if(elem.className == "minorCacheDetails"){
1538           counter++;
1539           if(counter == 2){
1540             spanelem = elem;
1541             break;
1542           }
1543         }
1544       }
1545       var datetxt = spanelem.innerHTML.substr(spanelem.innerHTML.indexOf(":") + 2).replace( /^\s+|\s+$/g, '' );
1546       var month_names = new Object();
1547       month_names["Jan"] = 1; 
1548       month_names["Feb"] = 2; 
1549       month_names["Mrz"] = 3; 
1550       month_names["Mar"] = 3; 
1551       month_names["Apr"] = 4; 
1552       month_names["May"] = 5; 
1553       month_names["Jun"] = 6; 
1554       month_names["Jul"] = 7; 
1555       month_names["Aug"] = 8; 
1556       month_names["Sep"] = 9; 
1557       month_names["Oct"] = 10; 
1558       month_names["Nov"] = 11; 
1559       month_names["Dec"] = 12;
1560       // settings_date_format:
1561       //   yyyy-MM-dd
1562       //   yyyy/MM/dd
1563       //   MM/dd/yyyy
1564       //   dd/MM/yyyy
1565       //   dd/MMM/yyyy
1566       //   MMM/dd/yyyy
1567       //   dd MMM yy
1568       var day = 0;
1569       var month = 0;
1570       var year = 0;
1571       switch(settings_date_format){
1572         case "yyyy-MM-dd":
1573           var match = datetxt.match(/([0-9]{4})-([0-9]{2})-([0-9]{2})/);
1574           if(match){
1575             day = match[3];
1576             month = match[2];
1577             year = match[1];
1578           }
1579         break;
1580         case "yyyy/MM/dd":
1581           var match = datetxt.match(/([0-9]{4})\/([0-9]{2})\/([0-9]{2})/);
1582           if(match){
1583             day = match[3];
1584             month = match[2];
1585             year = match[1];
1586           }
1587         break;
1588         case "MM/dd/yyyy":
1589           var match = datetxt.match(/([0-9]{2})\/([0-9]{2})\/([0-9]{4})/);
1590           if(match){
1591             day = match[2];
1592             month = match[1];
1593             year = match[3];
1594           }
1595         break;
1596         case "dd/MM/yyyy":
1597           var match = datetxt.match(/([0-9]{2})\/([0-9]{2})\/([0-9]{4})/);
1598           if(match){
1599             day = match[1];
1600             month = match[2];
1601             year = match[3];
1602           }
1603         break;
1604         case "dd/MMM/yyyy":
1605           var match = datetxt.match(/([0-9]{2})\/([A-Za-z]{3})\/([0-9]{4})/);
1606           if(match){
1607             day = match[1];
1608             month = month_names[match[2]];
1609             year = match[3];
1610           }
1611         break;
1612         case "MMM/dd/yyyy":
1613           var match = datetxt.match(/([A-Za-z]{3})\/([0-9]{2})\/([0-9]{4})/);
1614           if(match){
1615             day = match[2];
1616             month = month_names[match[1]];
1617             year = match[3];
1618           }
1619         break;
1620         case "dd MMM yy":
1621           var match = datetxt.match(/([0-9]{2}) ([A-Za-z]{3}) ([0-9]{2})/);
1622           if(match){
1623             day = match[1];
1624             month = month_names[match[2]];
1625             year = parseInt(match[3])+2000;
1626           }
1627         break;
1628       }
1629       
1630       if(month != 0) month--;
1631       var d=new Date(year,month,day);
1632   //alert(uneval(match)+"-"+day+"."+month+"."+year+"-"+d+"-"+d.getDay());
1633       if(d != "Invalid Date" && !(day == 0 && month == 0 && year == 0)){
1634         var weekday=new Array(7);
1635         weekday[0]="Sunday";
1636         weekday[1]="Monday";
1637         weekday[2]="Tuesday";
1638         weekday[3]="Wednesday";
1639         weekday[4]="Thursday";
1640         weekday[5]="Friday";
1641         weekday[6]="Saturday";
1642         spanelem.innerHTML = spanelem.innerHTML + " (" + weekday[d.getDay()] + ")";
1643       }else spanelem.innerHTML = spanelem.innerHTML + " (date format mismatch - see settings)";
1644     }
1645   }
1646 }catch(e){ gclh_error("Show DoW on Events",e); }

2006     function gclh_reset_counter(){
2007       var friends = getElementsByClass("FriendText");
2008     
2009       for(var i=0; i<friends.length; i++){
2010         var friend = friends[i];
2011         var name = friend.getElementsByTagName("a")[0];
2012         var founds = 0;
2013         var hides = 0;
2014         var challanges = 0;
2015   
2016         founds = GM_getValue("friends_founds_new_"+name.innerHTML,0);
2017         GM_setValue("friends_founds_"+name.innerHTML,founds);
2018         if(founds == 0) friend.getElementsByTagName("dd")[4].innerHTML = "0 ";
2019         else friend.getElementsByTagName("dd")[4].innerHTML = "<a href='/seek/nearest.aspx?ul="+urlencode(name.innerHTML)+"&disable_redirect'>"+founds+"</a>";
2020   
2021         hides = GM_getValue("friends_hides_new_"+name.innerHTML,0);
2022         GM_setValue("friends_hides_"+name.innerHTML,hides);
2023         if(hides == 0) friend.getElementsByTagName("dd")[5].innerHTML = "0 ";
2024         else friend.getElementsByTagName("dd")[5].innerHTML = "<a href='/seek/nearest.aspx?u="+urlencode(name.innerHTML)+"&disable_redirect'>"+hides+"</a> ";
2025   
2026         challanges = GM_getValue("friends_challenges_new_"+name.innerHTML,0);
2027         GM_setValue("friends_challenges_"+name.innerHTML,challanges);
2028         if(challanges == 0) friend.getElementsByTagName("dd")[6].innerHTML = "0 ";
2029         else friend.getElementsByTagName("dd")[6].innerHTML = "<a href='/challenges/search.aspx?st=user&cst=completed&user="+urlencode(name.innerHTML)+"'>"+challenges+"</a> ";
2030       }
2031     }
2032   
2033     var button = document.createElement("input");
2034     button.setAttribute("type","button");
2035     button.setAttribute("value","Reset counter");
2036     button.addEventListener("click", gclh_reset_counter, false);

2143     function saveStates(){
2144       for(var i=1; i<boxes.length; i++){
2145         var box = boxes[i].parentNode.childNodes[3];
2146       
2147         if(boxes[i].innerHTML.match(/Bookmarks/)) continue;
2148       
2149         if(typeof(box) == "undefined") continue;
2150         
2151         var show = box.style.display;
2152         if(typeof(show) == "undefined" || show != "none") show = "block";
2153         
2154         GM_setValue("show_box["+i+"]",show);
2155       }
2156     }
2157     
2158     for(var i=1; i<boxes.length; i++){
2159       var box = boxes[i].parentNode.childNodes[3];
2160       if(typeof(box) != "undefined"){
2161         if(boxes[i].innerHTML.match(/Bookmarks/)) continue;
2162       
2163         box.setAttribute("id","box_"+i);
2164        
2165         if(typeof(GM_getValue("show_box["+i+"]")) != "undefined") box.style.display = GM_getValue("show_box["+i+"]");
2166       
2167         if(box.style.display == "none")
2168           boxes[i].innerHTML = "<img id='lnk_"+i+"' src='http://www.geocaching.com/images/plus.gif' onClick='hide_box(\""+i+"\");' title='show'> "+boxes[i].innerHTML;
2169         else
2170           boxes[i].innerHTML = "<img id='lnk_"+i+"' src='http://www.geocaching.com/images/minus.gif' onClick='hide_box(\""+i+"\");' title='hide'> "+boxes[i].innerHTML;
2171         
2172         document.getElementById("lnk_"+i).addEventListener("click",saveStates,false);
2173       }
2174     }

2205     //Function called when map is loaded
2206     function gclh_map_loaded(){
2207     
2208     //unsafeWindow.Groundspeak.Map.UserSession.options.showFinds = false;
2209       var hillshadow_akt = false;
2210       //add Hill-Shadow
2211       if(settings_show_hillshadow){
2212         var hillshadow = new unsafeWindow.L.TileLayer("http://toolserver.org/~cmarqu/hill/{z}/{x}/{y}.png", {maxZoom: 20});
2213         unsafeWindow.MapSettings.Map.addLayer(hillshadow);
2214         hillshadow_akt = true;
2215         
2216         function maptoggle(e){
2217           //Mapnames: mpqosm, cloudmade, mpqa, osm, hikebike, ocm, ocmtransport, mytp, gm, gms, gmh, gmt
2218           if(e.layer.options.name !== undefined)
2219             GM_log(e.layer.options.name);
2220             if(e.layer.options.name == "gmt"){ //||Â e.layer.options.name == "ocm"){
2221               if(hillshadow_akt)unsafeWindow.MapSettings.Map.removeLayer(hillshadow);
2222               hillshadow_akt = false;
2223             }else{
2224               if(!hillshadow_akt)unsafeWindow.MapSettings.Map.addLayer(hillshadow);
2225               hillshadow_akt = true;
2226             }
2227         }
2228         unsafeWindow.MapSettings.Map.on('layeradd',maptoggle);
2229       }
2230   
2231       //Select Default-Layer

2747         var img = icons[i].childNodes[0];
2748         img.setAttribute("src",img_vip_off);
2749         img.setAttribute("title","Add User "+user+" to VIP-List");

2936             }

2948               img.setAttribute("src",img_vip_off);
2949               img.setAttribute("title","Add User "+user+" to VIP-List");

2951             }else{

3409     function gclh_dynamic_load(logs,num){
3410       var isBusy = false;
3411       var gclh_currentPageIdx = 1, gclh_totalPages = 1;
3412       var logInitialLoaded = false;
3413       unsafeWindow.$(window).endlessScroll({
3414         fireOnce: true,
3415         fireDelay: 500,
3416         bottomPixels: (($(document).height() - $("#cache_logs_container").offset().top) + 50),
3417         ceaseFire: function(){
3418           // stop the scrolling if the last page is reached.
3419           return (gclh_totalPages < gclh_currentPageIdx);
3420         },
3421         callback: function() {
3422           if (!isBusy && !document.getElementById("gclh_all_logs_marker")) {
3423             isBusy = true;
3424             if(unsafeWindow.$tfoot) unsafeWindow.$tfoot.show();
3425             
3426             for(var i=0; i<10; i++){
3427               if(logs[num]){
3428                 var newBody = unsafeWindow.$(document.createElement("TBODY"));
3429                 unsafeWindow.$("#tmpl_CacheLogRow_gclh").tmpl(logs[num]).appendTo(newBody);
3430                 newBody.find("a.tb_images").fancybox({'type': 'image', 'titlePosition': 'inside'});
3431                 unsafeWindow.$("#cache_logs_table").append(newBody.children());
3432               }
3433               num++; // num kommt vom vorherigen laden "aller" logs
3434             }
3435   
3436             gclh_add_vip_icon();
3437                   
3438             if(unsafeWindow.$tfoot) unsafeWindow.$tfoot.hide();
3439             isBusy = false;
3440           }
3441         }
3442       });
3443     }

3532     function gclh_search_logs(logs){
3533       function gclh_search(e){
3534         if(e.keyCode != 13) return false;
3535         if(!logs) return false;
3536         var search_text = this.value;
3537         if(!search_text) return false;
3538   
3539         search_text = search_text.replace(/Ã„/,"Ä");
3540         search_text = search_text.replace(/Ã¤/,"ä");
3541         search_text = search_text.replace(/Ã–/,"Ö");
3542         search_text = search_text.replace(/Ã¶/,"ö");
3543         search_text = search_text.replace(/Ãœ/,"Ü");
3544         search_text = search_text.replace(/Ã¼/,"ü");
3545         var regexp = new RegExp("("+search_text+")","i");
3546   
3547         var tbodys = document.getElementById("cache_logs_table").getElementsByTagName("tbody");
3548         for(var i=0; i<tbodys.length; i++){
3549           document.getElementById("cache_logs_table").removeChild(tbodys[i]);
3550         }
3551   
3552         for(var i=0; i<logs.length; i++){
3553           if(logs[i] && (logs[i].UserName.match(regexp) || logs[i].LogText.match(regexp))){
3554             var newBody = unsafeWindow.$(document.createElement("TBODY"));
3555             unsafeWindow.$("#tmpl_CacheLogRow_gclh").tmpl(logs[i]).appendTo(newBody);
3556             newBody.find("a.tb_images").fancybox({'type': 'image', 'titlePosition': 'inside'});
3557             unsafeWindow.$("#cache_logs_table").append(newBody.children());
3558           }
3559         }
3560   
3561         gclh_add_vip_icon();
3562   
3563         // Marker to disable dynamic log-load
3564         var marker = document.createElement("a");
3565         marker.setAttribute("id","gclh_all_logs_marker");
3566         document.getElementsByTagName("body")[0].appendChild(marker);
3567       }
3568   
3569       if(!document.getElementById("ctl00_ContentBody_lblFindCounts").childNodes[0]) return false;
3570       var form = document.createElement("form");
3571       var search = document.createElement("input");
3572       form.setAttribute("action","javascript:void(0);");
3573       form.appendChild(search);
3574       form.style.display = "inline";
3575       search.setAttribute("type","text");
3576       search.setAttribute("size","10");
3577       search.addEventListener("keyup",gclh_search,false);
3578       document.getElementById('ctl00_ContentBody_lblFindCounts').childNodes[0].appendChild(document.createTextNode("Search in logtext: "));
3579       document.getElementById('ctl00_ContentBody_lblFindCounts').childNodes[0].appendChild(form);
3580     }

3582     // Load "num" Logs
3583     function gclh_load_logs(num){
3584       var logs = new Array();
3585       var numPages = 1;
3586       var curIdx = 1;
3587   
3588       if(document.getElementById("gclh_vip_list")){
3589         var span_loading = document.createElement("span");
3590         span_loading.innerHTML = '<img src="/images/loading2.gif" class="StatusIcon" alt="Loading" />Loading Cache Logs...';
3591         document.getElementById("gclh_vip_list").appendChild(span_loading);
3592       }
3593       
3594       function gclh_load_helper(){
3595         if(numPages >= curIdx){
3596         if(unsafeWindow.$tfoot) unsafeWindow.$tfoot.show();
3597           GM_xmlhttpRequest({
3598             method: "GET",
3599             url: "http://www.geocaching.com/seek/geocache.logbook?tkn="+unsafeWindow.userToken+"&idx="+curIdx+"&num=100&decrypt=false",
3600             onload: function(response){
3601               var json = JSON.parse(response.responseText);
3602               if(numPages == 1){
3603                 numPages = json.pageInfo.totalPages;
3604               }
3605   
3606               if(unsafeWindow.$tfoot) unsafeWindow.$tfoot.hide();
3607               
3608               logs = logs.concat(json.data);
3609               
3610               curIdx++;
3611               
3612               for(var i = 0; i < json.data.length; i++){
3613                 var user = json.data[i].UserName;
3614                               
3615                 if(settings_show_vip_list){
3616                   all_users.push(user);
3617                 
3618                   if(!log_infos[user]) log_infos[user] = new Array();
3619                   log_infos[user][index] = new Object();
3620                   log_infos[user][index]["icon"] = "/images/icons/"+json.data[i].LogTypeImage;
3621                   log_infos[user][index]["id"] = json.data[i].LogID;
3622                   log_infos[user][index]["date"] = json.data[i].Visited;
3623                   log_infos[user][index]["log"] = json.data[i].LogText;
3624                   log_infos_long[index] = new Object();
3625                   log_infos_long[index]["user"] = user;
3626                   log_infos_long[index]["icon"] = "/images/icons/"+json.data[i].LogTypeImage;
3627                   log_infos_long[index]["id"] = json.data[i].LogID;
3628                   log_infos_long[index]["date"] = json.data[i].Visited;
3629                   log_infos_long[index]["log"] = json.data[i].LogText;
3630                   index++;
3631                 }
3632               }
3633               
3634               if(json.pageInfo.totalRows > logs.length){
3635                 gclh_load_helper();
3636               }else{
3637                 // Add Links
3638                 gclh_load_all_link(logs); // Load all Logs
3639                 gclh_filter_logs(logs); // Filter Logs
3640                 gclh_search_logs(logs); // Search Field
3641   
3642                 if(num == 0){
3643                   var newBody = unsafeWindow.$(document.createElement("TBODY"));
3644                   unsafeWindow.$("#tmpl_CacheLogRow_gclh").tmpl(logs).appendTo(newBody);
3645                   newBody.find("a.tb_images").fancybox({'type': 'image', 'titlePosition': 'inside'});
3646                   unsafeWindow.$("#cache_logs_table").append(newBody.children());
3647                 }else{
3648                   for(var i=0; i<num; i++){
3649                     if(logs[i]){
3650                       var newBody = unsafeWindow.$(document.createElement("TBODY"));
3651                       unsafeWindow.$("#tmpl_CacheLogRow_gclh").tmpl(logs[i]).appendTo(newBody);
3652                       newBody.find("a.tb_images").fancybox({'type': 'image', 'titlePosition': 'inside'});
3653                       unsafeWindow.$("#cache_logs_table").append(newBody.children());
3654                     }
3655                   }
3656                   gclh_dynamic_load(logs,num);
3657                 }
3658   
3659                 if(settings_show_vip_list){
3660                   gclh_build_vip_list();
3661                   
3662                 gclh_add_vip_icon();
3663                 }
3664               }
3665             }
3666           });
3667         }
3668       }
3669       
3670       gclh_load_helper();
3671     }
3672     
3673     if(settings_show_all_logs) gclh_load_logs(settings_show_all_logs_count);
3674     else gclh_load_logs(5);
3675   }
3676 }catch(e){ gclh_error("Replace Log-Loading function",e); }

3693 // Show other Coord-Formats in Listing
3694 try{
3695   if(document.location.href.match(/^http:\/\/www\.geocaching\.com\/seek\/cache_details\.aspx/) && document.getElementById('uxLatLon')){
3696     var box = document.getElementById('ctl00_ContentBody_LocationSubPanel').childNodes[0];
3697     var coords = document.getElementById('uxLatLon').innerHTML;
3698     var dec = toDec(coords);
3699     var lat = dec[0];
3700     var lng = dec[1];
3701     if(lat < 0) lat = "S "+(lat*-1);
3702     else lat = "N "+lat;
3703     if(lng < 0) lng = "W "+(lng*-1);
3704     else lng = "E "+lng;
3705     box.innerHTML += " - Dec: "+lat+" "+lng;
3706   
3707     var dms = DegtoDMS(coords);
3708     box.innerHTML += " - DMS: "+dms;
3709   }
3710   // ... and on print-page
3711   if(document.location.href.match(/^http:\/\/www\.geocaching\.com\/seek\/cdpf\.aspx/)){
3712     var box = getElementsByClass("UTM Meta")[0];
3713     var coords = getElementsByClass("LatLong Meta")[0];
3714     if(box && coords){
3715       var match = coords.innerHTML.match(/((N|S) [0-9][0-9]. [0-9][0-9]\.[0-9][0-9][0-9] (E|W) [0-9][0-9][0-9]. [0-9][0-9]\.[0-9][0-9][0-9])/);
3716       if(match && match[1]){
3717         coords = match[1];
3718         var dec = toDec(coords);
3719         var lat = dec[0];
3720         var lng = dec[1];
3721         if(lat < 0) lat = "S "+(lat*-1);
3722         else lat = "N "+lat;
3723         if(lng < 0) lng = "W "+(lng*-1);
3724         else lng = "E "+lng;
3725         box.innerHTML += "<br>Dec: "+lat+" "+lng;
3726   
3727         var dms = DegtoDMS(coords);
3728         box.innerHTML += "<br>DMS: "+dms;
3729       }
3730     }
3731   }
3732 }catch(e){ gclh_error("Show other coord-formats",e); }

3819   
3820       if(search_value.match(/^(N|S) [0-9][0-9]. [0-9][0-9]\.[0-9][0-9][0-9] (E|W) [0-9][0-9][0-9]. [0-9][0-9]\.[0-9][0-9][0-9]$/)){

3823         if(GM_getValue("home_lat",0) != parseInt(latlng[0]*10000000)) GM_setValue("home_lat",parseInt(latlng[0]*10000000)); // * 10000000 because GM don't know float
3824         if(GM_getValue("home_lng",0) != parseInt(latlng[1]*10000000)) GM_setValue("home_lng",parseInt(latlng[1]*10000000));
3825       }
3826     }
3827   
3828     window.addEventListener("load", setCoordsHelper, false); // On first hit, the search-field ist filled after loading - so we have to wait
3829   }

3863 // count cache matrix on statistics page or profile page
3864 try{
3865   if (isLocation("my/statistics.aspx") || isLocation("profile/?guid")) {
3866     var table = document.getElementById('ctl00_ContentBody_StatsDifficultyTerrainControl1_uxDifficultyTerrainTable');
3867     if (null == table) {
3868       // on the profile page the ID is different than on the statistics page
3869       table = document.getElementById("ctl00_ContentBody_ProfilePanel1_StatsDifficultyTerrainControl1_uxDifficultyTerrainTable");
3870     }
3871     if (table) {
3872       var zeros = 0;
3873       var cells = table.getElementsByTagName('td');
3874       for (var i = 0; i < cells.length; i++) {
3875         var cell = cells[i];
3876         if (cell.className == 'stats_cellzero') {
3877           zeros++;
3878         }
3879       }
3880       var foundMatrix = (9*9)-zeros; 
3881       var link = document.getElementById('uxDifficultyTerrainHelp');
3882       if (link) {
3883         var headline = link.previousSibling;
3884         if (headline) {
3885           headline.nodeValue += (' (' + foundMatrix + '/' + (9*9) + ')'); 
3886         }
3887       }
3888     }
3889   }
3890 }catch(e){ gclh_error("Count Cache Matrix",e); }

4126   html += "  visibility: visible;";
4127   html += "  top: 10px;";
4128   html += "  left: -125px;";
4129   html += "  font-weight: normal;";
4130   html += "  border: 1px solid #000000;";
4131   html += "  background-color: #d8cd9d;";
4132   html += "}";
4133   css.innerHTML = html;
4134   document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0].appendChild(css);
4135 }

4576 // Check for Updates
4577 function checkVersion(){
4578   var url = "http://www.amshove.net/greasemonkey/updates.php";
4579   var time = new Date().getTime();
4580   var next_check = 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000; // Milliseconds
4581   var last_check = parseInt(GM_getValue("update_last_check"),10);
4582   var token = GM_getValue("token","");
4583   if(token == "") GM_setValue("token",""+Math.random());
4584 
4585   if(!last_check) last_check = 0;
4586 
4587   if((last_check + next_check) < time){
4588     if(GM_xmlhttpRequest) GM_xmlhttpRequest({
4589       method: 'GET',
4590       url: url,
4591       headers: {'User-Agent' : 'GM ' + scriptName + ' v' + scriptVersion + ' ' + last_check + ' ' + token},
4592       onload: function(result) {
4593         var version = result.responseText.match(/^([a-zA-Z0-9-_.]*)=([0-9.]*)/);
4594         var changelog = result.responseText.match(/changelog=((.*\n*)*)/);
4595 
4596         GM_setValue("new_version",version[2]);
4597 
4598         if(version[1] == scriptName && version[2] != scriptVersion){
4599           var text = "Version "+version[2]+" of "+scriptName+" greasemonkey script is available.\n"+
4600                   "You are currently using version "+scriptVersion+".\n\n"+
4601                   "Click OK to upgrade.\n";
4602           if(changelog) text += "\n\nChangelog:\n"+changelog[1];
4603           if(window.confirm(text)) GM_openInTab(url);
4604         }
4605       }
4606     });
4607     GM_setValue('update_last_check', time.toString());
4608   }
4609 }
4610 
4611 try{
4612   checkVersion();
4613 }catch(e){ gclh_error("Check for Updates",e); }

4625   // Sync: Helper
4626   function sync_changeConfigID(new_ConfigID){
4627     configID = new_ConfigID;
4628 //    GM_setValue("settings_configsync_configid",ConfigID);
4629     if(document.getElementById('configID_text')) document.getElementById('configID_text').innerHTML = configID;
4630     if(document.getElementById('work_with_text')) document.getElementById('work_with_text').style.color = '';

4634   function encode64(inp){ // http://mrfoo.de/archiv/434-Base64-in-Javascript.html
4635     var key="ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789+/=";
4636     var chr1,chr2,chr3,enc3,enc4,i=0,out="";
4637     while(i<inp.length){
4638       chr1=inp.charCodeAt(i++);if(chr1>127) chr1=88;
4639       chr2=inp.charCodeAt(i++);if(chr2>127) chr2=88;
4640       chr3=inp.charCodeAt(i++);if(chr3>127) chr3=88;
4641       if(isNaN(chr3)) {enc4=64;chr3=0;} else enc4=chr3&63;
4642       if(isNaN(chr2)) {enc3=64;chr2=0;} else enc3=((chr2<<2)|(chr3>>6))&63;
4643       out+=key.charAt((chr1>>2)&63)+key.charAt(((chr1<<4)|(chr2>>4))&63)+key.charAt(enc3)+key.charAt(enc4);
4644     }
4645 //    return encodeURIComponent(out);
4646     return out;
4647   }

4659   // Sync: Upload Config
4660   function sync_uploadConfig(){
4661     if(!configID) return false;
4662 
4663     var vals = new Array;
4664     var allVals = GM_listValues();
4665     var val;
4666     for (var valName in allVals) {
4667       val=allVals[valName];
4668       var value = GM_getValue(val);
4669 
4670       if(typeof(value) != "boolean"){
4671         if(!value.substr || value.substr(0,1) != "[") value = "\""+encode64(value)+"\"";
4672         else{
4673           var arr = eval(value);
4674           var new_arr = new Array();
4675           for(var i=0; i<arr.length; i++){
4676             if(arr[i]) new_arr.push(encode64(arr[i]));
4677           }
4678           value = uneval(new_arr);
4679         }
4680       }else{
4681         if(value) value = "true";
4682         else value = "false";
4683         value = "\""+encode64(value)+"\"";
4684       }
4685 
4686       vals.push("\""+encode64(val)+"\" : "+value);
4687     }
4688 
4689 //alert(uneval(vals));
4690 //alert(encode64("{"+vals.join(",")+"}"));
4691     GM_xmlhttpRequest({
4692       method: "POST",
4693       headers: {'User-Agent' : 'GM ' + scriptName + ' v' + scriptVersion + ' ' + browserID},
4694       url: sync_url+"uploadConfig.php",
4695       data: "configID="+configID+"&json="+encode64("{"+vals.join(",")+"}"),
4696       headers: {
4697         "Content-Type": "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"
4698       },
4699       onload: function(response) {
4700         alert("uploaded: "+uneval(response)); // TODO
4701       }
4702     });
4703   }
